description: Mint and lamb are the best of friends and team up to form a delicious, juicy burger with Greek flavours.
keywords: Lamb burger,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free
name: Greek Style Minted Lamb Burger Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the lamb in a bowl, add the mint, olives, oregano, cumin and coriander and black pepper and mix well. Divide the mixture into 4 and shape into flat burger patties.
Drizzle a little oil in a large griddle pan over a medium high heat and brown the burgers on one side, 4-5 minutes. Turn them over and cook for 4 more minutes.
To make the tzatziki style sauce, mix the yoghurt in a bowl with the grated cucumber, garlic and a little chopped mint.
Serve the burgers with crumbled feta, roasted red capsicum and tzatziki sauce in pita breads or on wholemeal buns.
